definition: seizure of a vehicle in transit either to rob it or divert it to an alternate destination, take arbitrarily or by force
details:
noun
- seizure of a vehicle in transit either to rob it or divert it to an alternate destination
= synonyms: highjack
verb
- take arbitrarily or by force
= synonyms: highjack, pirate, commandeer
- seize control of
= example: seize control of
= synonyms: move in on
